name: first
title: .first()
desc: Reduce the set of matched elements to the first in the set.

examples.desc: Highlight the first span in a paragraph.
examples.html: Look: This is some text in a paragraph. This is a note about it.

entries.longdesc:
Given a jQuery object that represents a set of DOM elements, the .first() method constructs a new jQuery object from the first element in that set.

Consider a page with a simple list on it:


<ul>
  <li>list item 1</li>
  <li>list item 2</li>
  <li>list item 3</li>
  <li>list item 4</li>
  <li>list item 5</li>
</ul>

We can apply this method to the set of list items:


$( "li" ).first().css( "background-color", "red" );

The result of this call is a red background for the first item.
